directions: Preheat air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Combine vegetarian sausage slices, onion, bell peppers, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl; stir to coat. Pour mixture into the basket of the air fryer.
Cook for 10 minutes. Shake basket and cook for 5 more minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the sausage should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
ingredients: 2 links vegetarian bratwurst sausage (such as Beyond Meat®), sliced
½  green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
½  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Air Fryer Beyond Meat® Brats, Onions, and Peppers
